ygData.subject: Of fire and evil storms!
ygData.msgSnippet: The group quickly began to set off in an effort to locate where TUSCON and the others had been taken as well as to find out just who was behind all this

Subject: Of fire and evil storms!
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=435352480; y=8TSurPU6hU1JjRRGmi41Ke3bZtYAaTp0rWQAsFuG4D6bLrNnGAgPCg

The group quickly began to set off in an effort to locate where TUSCON
and the others had been taken as well as to find out just who was
behind all this madness or what he had planned.

The terrain was rough and unlevel, vehicles of any sort would have had
great difficulty making across any of it if there were any.
Fortunately most everone is traveling on leg or wing . . . or digging,
so they are able to keep pace with the passage. Foliage and underbrush
making the passing difficult but not impossible.

Following the signal that LEO PRIME had was taking them off any
observable path, although curiously it followed the trail that
apparently TUSCON and his captors had taken, at least judging by what
BANTOR and TERRORGATOR were detecting with their tracking skills.

Eventually they came out over a small mountain pass, coming around
where the trees opened up and for the first time a path could be seen
again leading down into more trees.

LEO PRIME turned to wave at HYDRAS, showing him the tracker, the
beeping was getting more steady, they were getting close when suddenly
it was blasted out of LEO's hand as laser fire opened up on them from
the now open air errupted all around the group!

Trees were burned down, instantly incinerated by acid and
disintergration cannons, shrubbery vanished into nothingness! Up in
the air the massive form of CYCLONUS hovered in his space interceptor
mode with sweeps and a few seekers flew around him like some sort of
black entorage.

"Surrender or die!" CYCLONUS ' deep voice said from the air!
(TAG)

- Preston
